name: You Are A Squirrel
description:
**

Hello everyone,

me and Yanxi decided to keep working on this project.

We brought so many new ideas.

Please wait for us!

Thanks

**


You are a proud squirrel Nutsy.
A modern art museum right next to your nest is your
favorite playground, even though there is a joykill
human always trying to catch you.
You fought with him almost everyday.

But one day, he disappeared. 
Where is he?

Once again, you sneak into the museum……

A 3D platformer game with lock and key mechanism

Jump around to eat the good nuts

Avoid the poisoned nuts. They are lethal!

Find keys to unlock new floors.

Controls

Move - WASD

Jump - SPACE

Team

Ina Joe - Inadistrict.com

Yanxi Wang - (Portfolio Link)

SPOILER ALERT!

Level Design Plan

Floor1

Floor2

Basement
